articles.title: 🔥 Zapier integration
articles.desc: The new integration with Zapier is now available publicly! Automate your marketing workflows by connecting AcyMailing with 2000+ apps.

articles.title: 🔥 Sending service improvements
articles.desc: The AcyMailing sending service options have been improved for mobile view, and tips have been added to guide you in validating your domains.

articles.title: 🧩 Membership Pro integration
articles.desc: A new integration with Membership Pro lets you filter AcyMailing users by plans they subscribed to.

articles.title: 🧩 Joomla 5
articles.desc: AcyMailing can now be used on Joomla 5 websites without requiring the compatibility plugin to be active.

articles.title: 🧩 Better integration for Events Booking
articles.desc: The links to categories, locations and registration page now use the specified Joomla menu ID if any, for the Events Booking integration.

articles.title: 🧩 WooCommerce follow-up campaigns
articles.desc: It is now possible to select product variations in the follow-up based on WooCommerce purchases.

articles.title: 🧩 WooCommerce automations
articles.desc: It is now possible to select product variations in the WooCommerce purchase filter, and filter on multiple products.

articles.title: 🧩 WooCommerce abandoned cart
articles.desc: In WooCommerce abandoned cart send settings, you can now choose to send the email based on hours since the order has been placed.

articles.title: 🧩 Memberpress integration update
articles.desc: The Memberpress integration plugin has been updated to take into account the new way to store custom fields.

articles.title: 🎁 Quick user subscribe actions
articles.desc: It is now possible from the subscriber listing to subscribe and unsubscribe users from lists by clicking on the list icon.

articles.title: 🎁 Editor videos
articles.desc: A new option lets you choose if a play button should be added on the video thumbnails when inserting videos in the emails.

articles.title: 🎁 Easy access to mail IDs
articles.desc: On the campaigns listing, the corresponding mail ID has been added to make it easier to use the new REST API.

articles.title: 🎁 Improved List-Unsubscribe header
articles.desc: When inserting an unsubscribe link in an email, and having the option to add a List-Unsubscribe header, the direct unsubscribe link is added in addition to the email sent to an admin.

articles.title: 🎁 A/B test campaigns click rate
articles.desc: When an A/B test campaign is based on the click rate, it is now calculated on the number of users that opened the email rather than the number of recipients.

splash_content.title: DISCOVER WHAT CHANGED FOR BUG FIXES

articles.title: 🛠️ Translations fixes
articles.desc: The accents are now correctly displayed in select fields when building a subscription form.

articles.title: 🛠️ Bounce connection for self-signed certificates
articles.desc: The connection verification for the bounce address credentials now correctly shows a success message when the self signed certificate option is disabled.

articles.title: 🛠️ Unsubscribe link in multilingual campaigns
articles.desc: Fixed direct unsubscribe link not working for secondary languages in multilingual campaigns.

articles.title: 🛠️ Multiple batch system with security key
articles.desc: For the send process, the multiple batch system now works correctly when the security key is active.

articles.title: 🛠️ Mailgun embedded attachments
articles.desc: Fixed Mailgun embed attachment only embedding the first one.

articles.title: 🛠️ Mailgun BCC option
articles.desc: Fixed Mailgun BCC option only sending to the first recipient in the BCC list.

articles.title: 🛠️ Hikashop variant categories
articles.desc: Fixed the Hikashop filter on variant categories not taken into account.

articles.title: 🛠️ SecurImage captcha compatibility
articles.desc: Fixed compatibility with the captcha SecurImage when submitting subscription forms.

articles.title: 🛠️ VirtueMart guest users subscription
articles.desc: Fixed a bug with the VirtueMart integration that was not subscribing guest users to lists when they checked the lists checkbox on the one page checkout.

articles.title: 🛠️ Starter version update
articles.desc: Some users on starter version were not able to fast update their AcyMailing version, it has been fixed.
